name: Dufry AG
goal:
Dufry is a global travel retailer with operations in 64 countries.

Dufry operates around 2'200 shops located at airports, cruise liners, seaports, and other locations.

We developed a strong portfolio of long-term concessions with airport authorities and other landlords.

Dufry provides its customers with prestigious brands from more than 1'000 suppliers.

Our customers rely on the professional services of more than 31'000 Dufry employees.

Global and local. Dufry is globally active, with its corporate structure organized in five regions. We work with local partners and adjust our offerings to the local habits of our customers.

Dufry has a clear vision -- We want to be the industry's most innovative and profitable company.

The group is publicly listed in Switzerland and in Brazil.

The headquarters of our Group are located in Basel, Switzerland. Our company's history goes back to its foundation in 1865.
euInitiatives: Dufry follows carefully developments in the area of credit card regulation
